summary.name: Ayush Jain
summary.title: Product Leader, Technical PM
summary.personalSummary: Aspiring Product Manager/Owner with 10+ years driving product outcomes across startups & MNCs. IITian with rare blend of hands-on AI/LLM expertise and deep technical depth—enabling me to bridge product vision with engineering execution. Launched 9+ products (0→1), achieving 5M DAU gaming platform, 1M MAU enterprise Copilot, and 60% conversion lifts through customer-driven experimentation. Conducted 50+ in-person customer interviews, built experimentation platforms, and translated insights into features that moved business metrics. 4x founder experienced in product discovery, roadmap prioritization, go-to-market, and cross-functional leadership. Seeking PM role where my technical fluency in AI/GenAI and breadth across 6+ domains amplifies product impact.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.team: M365 Copilot & M365 Office · Privacy & Compliance Lead
experience.product: Enterprise AI Copilot, B2B SaaS, Sovereign Cloud
achievements: Launch Contribution: Contributed to launch of M365 Copilot (Satya Nadella's top priority), coordinating with cross-functional teams across engineering, design, and compliance. Product grew to 1M MAU. Drove sovereign cloud expansion to 2 new markets within 1.5 months.

Compliance & User Experience: Owned GDPR compliance and privacy requirements. Reduced auth latency by 20% improving user onboarding. Delivered 245 security/privacy requirements across 15 KPIs, balancing user needs with regulatory constraints.

Cross-functional Collaboration: Worked with 8+ teams (security, legal, infrastructure, design). Created 11 technical video-docs improving stakeholder alignment. Drove action-items increasing 10% team productivity.
Innovation: Built OS-level Copilot voice-and-vision prototype at Microsoft Hackathon (FHL). Contributed to hiring, doubling team to 80 members.
experience.transition: Seeking Product Manager/Owner role to leverage hands-on AI/LLM expertise and deep technical depth for greater product impact.

experience.title: Founding Engineering Lead & Product
experience.product: Health Insurance (B2C), Group Insurance (B2B), Payments Platform, CRM
experience.promotion: 2 promotions in 2 years: Recognized by Sachin Bansal (Flipkart co-founder) for product impact
achievements: Product Strategy & Launch: Defined product vision for insurance vertical as founding member. Launched 8+ insurance products (retail & group) achieving 20k+ DAU, 300+ daily purchases, 1+ lac policies/year. Created no-code product-config platform enabling 30-60% faster launches.

User Research & Customer Insights: Conducted 50+ in-person customer interviews and site visits. EMI payment option (from customer feedback) drove 60% conversion boost. Payment mandates reduced EMI drop-offs by 8%. Simplified waiting-period messaging improved conversion by 2%.

Funnel Analysis & Experimentation: Built metrics funnels with Firebase & MoEngage. Created experimentation platform for context-based A/Bs (location, age, behavior) achieving 10-60% conversion lifts. Dynamic gateway switching (Juspay/Razorpay/PayU) boosted payment success by 5%. Drove renewal upgradability improving renewal-conversions by 5%.

Cross-functional Leadership: Collaborated with business, actuarial, compliance, and operations. Led 13+ major releases. Grew team 2→40, conducted 270+ interviews. Represented product in IRDAI regulatory audits. Mentored 8+ developers, 6 achieved promotions.

Customer Ops & CRM: Built real-time CRM handling 20k tickets/day with in-app chat. Conducted site visits to pin-down requirements. Improved agent productivity by 5% through UI and tooling enhancements. Enabled 10x scalability while reducing infra costs by 20%.
experience.transition: Insurance vertical moved to maintenance mode; leadership dissolved and team downsized. Sought new challenges.

experience.title: SSE
experience.team: Founding Engineer · Supply Chain Management Platform
experience.technologies: C#, React, Java, AWS, Camunda, Consul, Redis, SQS, Kubernetes
achievements: Built Ocean-Freight FCL first & last-leg (Germany-China) with rate-management, trucking integrations, customs workflow on Camunda. Implemented Air-Freight with Lufthansa spot-rates. 80+% test-coverage.
Launched L4 control-tower model in 2 months. Integrated Resilience4j, improved test-coverage by 20%. Represented engineering at Hamburg summit.
experience.transition: Product-engineering gaps and absence of live clients; sought opportunity with clearer product-market fit.

experience.title: Engineering & Product (Gaming)
experience.team: Real-time Multiplayer Gaming Platform · TeenPatti Gold
experience.product: Poker, Rummy, LAN Multiplayer Engine (B2C Gaming)
experience.promotion: Promoted for exceptional product delivery; grew platform DAU 5x
achievements: User Research & Product Discovery: Conducted surveys, played games at public events, and explored casinos to collect data points on popular game variations and play-styles. Worked closely with product and data-science teams to define requirements and identify drop-offs in funnels.

Product Launch & Growth: Led launch of Poker, Rummy, Tournaments, Dealers-Choice. Achieved 2.5M DAU, D7 retention +30%, conversions +20%. Total platform growth: DAU 5x to 5M, revenue 2x to USD 3M/month, 100M downloads.

Experimentation & Monetization: Built experimentation portal for product team to manage A/Bs. Optimized monetization, engagement, and retention. Mini-games and features improved user-engagement by 40%+ and in-game money flows by 15%. Expanded to Middle-East markets with PayPal integration (+20% regional inflows).

Feature Innovation: Conceptualized LAN gameplay engine enabling offline multiplayer. Gained 1M+ users in first month, reused across 6+ games. Reduced crashes from 15% to 1% through systematic bug-hunts.
experience.transition: Co-founders exited the company; explored entrepreneurship with colleagues during mobile gaming boom in India.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
experience.team: Transportation Financial Services · Refunds & Cost Allocation
experience.product: Customer Refunds Platform, Cost Allocation Service (Internal B2B)
achievements: Customer Experience Impact: Re-architected refunds service processing USD 1M+/day, improving customer refund experience by 50% and reducing operational issues by 97%. Applied Amazon's customer-obsession principles.
Cross-team Collaboration: Built Cost Allocation Service handling 1M+ events/day, integrating with 6+ teams across transportation, finance, and operations. Designed generic allocators enabling reuse.
Data-Driven Decisions: Created reusable data-pipeline framework for Redshift analytics, adopted company-wide. Established metrics and dashboards for peak-preparation and performance monitoring.
experience.transition: Sought product ownership and hands-on startup exposure after mastering Amazon's leadership principles and tech practices.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Engineering & Product Lead
entrepreneurialExperience.product: D2C Marketplace, Seller Platform, Order Management (B2C/B2B)
achievements: Product Vision & Strategy: Defined product roadmap for hyperlocal D2C marketplace. Worked directly with business to finalize requirements, ambiguities, and priorities. Led 7-person team from concept to launch.
Go-to-Market: Executed seller acquisition strategy, onboarding 3000+ sellers in Bangalore. Achieved 150+ daily orders through targeted growth campaigns.
Search & Discovery: Improved generic-search and autocomplete using success metrics and search heuristics. Prioritized tech-debt, stabilized production, reduced bugs by 80%.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Pre-seed stage; market conditions and funding landscape posed challenges during 2023 tech downturn.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Product Architect
entrepreneurialExperience.team: Founding Member · AI-Enabled Social Network for Professionals
achievements: Product Vision & Strategy: Defined product direction for AI-enabled social platform targeting influencers, investors, and founders. Led product discovery and feature prioritization.
Rapid Experimentation: Built modular design with experimentation framework and metrics dashboard. Quickly tested 30+ concepts and flows to find product-market fit.
User Acquisition: Acquired 20K users, grew to 5K WAU through product-led growth. Designed AI-persona, curated introductions, and smart reminders via WhatsApp interface.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Pivoted to job opportunities during the 2023 tech market correction and layoff wave.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Founder & Product Architect
entrepreneurialExperience.team: EdTech Platform for Virtual Learning and Online Exams
entrepreneurialExperience.product: Virtual Classroom, Online Exams, Proctoring Solution (B2B EdTech)
achievements: Customer Discovery: Conducted discussions with school teachers, college professors, and students to gather feedback. Identified COVID-driven demand gap. Built features addressing educator pain points.
Feature Innovation: Designed AI-powered proctoring with face-detection, eye-tracking, and OCR for automated evaluation. Flexible prepaid pricing model differentiated from competitors.
Validation & Traction: Smartphone-first, low-bandwidth design for Indian market. Demoed at 6+ IITs, signed multiple MoUs, got positive feedback from coaching institutes.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Microsoft Teams and Cisco Webex offered free subscriptions during COVID; limited resources to compete.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Co-Founder & Product Architect
entrepreneurialExperience.product: Casual Mobile Games, Regional Language Gaming (B2C)
achievements: Product Strategy: Identified market gap for regional-language casual games. Built reusable framework enabling any game launch within 2 weeks. Launched 5 multiplayer games.
Retention & Growth: Shabd Khel achieved 30K+ downloads, 51% D1 retention (industry benchmark: 25-30%). Localized for 7 Indian languages with auto-generated levels.
Investor Validation: Received positive feedback from Elevation Capital on retention metrics. Got merger invitation from competitor Bombay Play, validating product-market fit.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Ran out of personal savings; positive feedback but no immediate pre-seed investment materialized.

education.note: NJACK Coordinator (2013-14): Led Computer Science Club; prepared students for ACM ICPC, Google Code Jam.
